description: Tests the pagination controls to ensure users can navigate between pages of product listings in the 'Men' category.
steps: Verify that the product listing updates to show the second page of products.
Verify that the product listing updates to show the next page of products.
Verify that the product listing resets to the first page.
expected_results: Pagination controls correctly update the product listing.
Users can navigate between all pages.
edge_cases: Pagination does not update the product list.
Pagination does not reset to the first page correctly.
dependencies: Backend API for paginated product retrieval.
api_interactions: GET request to retrieve paginated product data.
performance_metrics: Time taken to update product list on pagination.
accessibility_requirements: Verify pagination controls are accessible via screen readers.
Ensure sufficient color contrast for pagination links.
